title: the rise
author: the rise
created_time: August 27, 2022, 05:11:17 PMLast edit: November 03, 2022, 06:35:24 PM by the rise
content: Rules updateRules for comment assignments- Use the WORDS in this document as commentsBAHASA INDONESIA DOKUMEN- each participant must not have the same question or template in commenting, use a comment template like:- Comments in Bahasa Indonesian are preferred.       GENERAL RULES✔️ We are allocating 900.000 tokens $BIG✔️ Bounty will run  4 months - Participant payments will be made every 2 month (per 8 weeks), as long as the program is running✔️ USE WALLET BSC TO RECEIVE YOUR REWARD✔️ The token distribution process to participants (our supporters) will be arranged and carried out by the BIG METAVERSE team.✔️ Does not send bounty issues and is strictly forbidden to send spam messages in telegram✔️ Participants who do not follow the rules of each campaign will not get stakes/reward✔️ If you have other questions, please join BIG METAVERSE Telegram Bounty✔️ All participants must join BIG METAVERSE Telegram Group✔️ Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately, and all your accounts will be banned permanently.✔️ We reserve the right to make changes on any terms if it’s reasonable to do so✔️ We reserve the right to remove a participant from the campaign for a valid reason.✔️ We reserve the right to suspend or have the allocation reduced on a certain bounty if we found it underperforming.✔️ We reserve the right to make adjustments and modifications to the rules if necessary✔️ By agreeing to this rule, you are subject to the existing rules week 1 : 28/08 - 03/09 week 2 : 04/09 - 10/09 week 3 : 11/09 - 17/09week 4 : 18/09 - 24/09 week 5 : 25/06 - 01/10 week 6 : 02/10 - 08/10 week 7 : 09/10 - 15/10 week 8 : 16/10 - 22/10 week 9 : 23/10 - 29/10 week 10 : 30/10 - 05/11 ... Proof of Authentication Post FormatCode:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: Bitcointalk Profile Link: Campaign Participated: Wallet Address:Important:1. Read the Rules from the bounty thread carefully.2. Please read the Disclaimer carefully.Rewards:Rewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the BIG METAVERSE twitter Page- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- must join telegram if you don't join you will not receive stake- You must make minimum of 5 retweets ,5 tweets  & 5 comment per week. Mention BIG METAVERSE Project, Be sure to include following hashtag  @MetaverseBIG#metaverse #metaversegame #metaverseart #metaversecrypto #BIGlobby #BIGtoken #BIGcoin #bridgeingain #crypto #cryptoartist #cryptoart #cryptoartcollector #cryptobusiness #cryptocoin- Every retweet must be likedRules for comment assignmentsRules for comment assignments- Use the WORDS in this document as commentsBAHASA INDONESIA DOKUMEN- each participant must not have the same question or template in commenting, use a comment template like:- Comments in Bahasa Indonesian are preferred.Report Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:[/list]Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Twitter Profile Link:Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Retweet Link 3Retweet Link 4Retweet Link 5Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2Tweet Link 3Tweet Link 4Tweet Link 5comment link 1comment link 2comment link 3comment link 4comment link 5Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.Rewards:- Have more than 500 friends : 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 friends: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 friends: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 friends: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must like the Facebook BIG METAVERSE- Facebook account must have a minimum of 500 friends- must join telegram if you don't join you will not receive stake- You must make minimum of 5 repost ,5 post  & 5 comment per week. Mention BIG METAVERSE Project, Be sure to include following hashtag  @MetaverseBIG#metaverse #metaversegame #metaverseart #metaversecrypto #BIGlobby #BIGtoken #BIGcoin #bridgeingain #crypto #cryptoartist #cryptoart #cryptoartcollector #cryptobusiness #cryptocoin- Every repost must be likedRules for comment assignments- Use the WORDS in this document as commentsBAHASA INDONESIA DOKUMEN- each participant must not have the same question or template in commenting, use a comment template like:- Comments in Bahasa Indonesian are preferred.Report Format:You must post all your repost links and post in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Facebook Profile Link:Week 1Repost Link 1Repost Link 2Repost Link 3Repost Link 4Repost Link 5post Link 1post Link 2post Link 3post Link 4post Link 5comment link 1comment link 2comment link 3comment link 4comment link 5Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.Rewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the Instagram BIG METAVERSE- must join telegram if you don't join you will not receive stake- Each participant must follow Instagram BIG METAVERSE- Must like and share all posts from the BIG METAVERSE - You must make at least 5 posts/week. Be sure to include the following hashtags, or select some using a maximum of 6 tags  #metaverse #metaversegame #metaverseart #metaversecrypto #BIGlobby #BIGtoken #BIGcoin #bridgeingain #crypto #cryptoartist #cryptoart #cryptoartcollector #cryptobusiness #cryptocoin- For pictures can be taken on the websiteReport Format:You must post all your post links in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Instagram Profile Link:Week 1post Link 1post Link 2post Link 3post Link 4post Link 5Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.use name : Big Metaverse ( your username | Big Metaverse )Rewards:- 1 stake/participantsRules:- use our avatar & add username on your telegram profile- must join Telegram Global & Telegram Local indonesiaRules of posting on telegram- Use the WORDS in this document as commentsENGLISH DOCUMENTS | BAHASA INDONESIA DOKUMEN- Use the same language according to the group you join- Post must be relevant to the post.(if the post is in Indonesian, the comments must be in Indonesian, and if it is in English, please comment in English.)- Post in Bahasa Indonesian are preferred.Report Format:You must post all your post links in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:[/list]Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Telegram Username:Week 1Message Link 1Message Link 2Message Link 3Message Link 4Message Link 5Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.Rewards:Rewards:- High quality: 3 stakes (High quality video and >3000 views)- Good quality: 2 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 views )- Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >700 views)For this task, bounty hunters will be rewarded for creating high-quality unique, interesting, and engaging videos about big metaverse Project.Some examples of potential topics:Please go to the second post to read about potential topics.Rules:- subscribe youtobe Big Metaverse- you must have at least 1000 subscribers- must join telegram if you don't join you will not receive stake- The video description Be sure to include the following hashtags, or select some using a maximum of 6 tags  #metaverse #metaversegame #metaverseart #metaversecrypto #BIGlobby #BIGtoken #BIGcoin #bridgeingain #crypto #cryptoartist #cryptoart #cryptoartcollector #cryptobusiness #cryptocoin- Any language is accepted.- Sound and video quality must be high, although webcam and smartphone videos are accepted.- Content must be unique and original.- The more views you accumulate, the more tokens you will be allotted.- All views will be counted after the end of the campaign and will reward its creator accordingly.- The video must be more than 1 min in length.- No hate speech, racism, the religious or personal attack. The content must be respected and mannerful in all ways.- every bounty hunter participant can write up to 5 Vidio.Rewards based on quality:- Good : 5 stake- Medium : 3 stake- Bad : 1 stakeTo qualify for a blog bounty, each article must:- Has 500+ words or more without spaces- Contain at least 2 links to the Big Metaverse Project.- Have unique content (ANN translations do not count)- The reward will be negotiated based on article length + value of the publication, Content Quality And we reserved the right to give any Blog/ Article any coins.- Strictly NO to Plagiarism, content must pass the Copyscape.- Must include at least 3 official Plastic Finance Project links (Website, Twitter, Youtube, Medium,  Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)- No hate speech, racism, the religious or personal attack. The content must be respected and mannerful in all ways.- contents must remain active for at least 60 days.- Articles published on these platforms Like .blogspot LinkedIn or other free blogging websites do not count.- We Reserve the right to reject any blog/ entry.- every bounty hunter participant can write up to 8 articles.reward:- 1 stake/weekRules:- Follow Tiktok Big Metaverse- Like all the posts it has- Comment on all the posts- Also you need to like all the future posts they gonna post[/list]Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Tiktok Profile Link:Week 1Video Link 1Video Link 2Video Link 3Video Link 4Video Link 5Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.Reward:1 stake/weekRules:- Each participant must follow the work rules given by the team- Participants must follow Big Metaverse telegram and twitter account- Shilling on Bitcointalk forums is NOT ALLOWEDRules for comment assignments- Use the WORDS in this document as commentsENGLISH DOCUMENTS | BAHASA INDONESIA DOKUMEN- each participant must not have the same question or template in commenting, use a comment template like:[english version]- Comments must be relevant to the post.(if the post is in Indonesian, the comments must be in Indonesian, and if it is in English, please comment in English.)- Comments in Bahasa Indonesian are preferred.Report Format:You must post all your post links in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Tiktok Profile Link:Week 1Share Link 1Share Link 2Share Link 3Share Link 4Share Link 5....Please make your report as a new post every week in the bounty thread, but do not update the old post.QuoteDisclaimer: "The managers of this campaign and author of this post are not part of the entity. Bounty managers are providing their services for tracking and evaluating participants in the campaign for the purpose of reporting results to the projects core team. Therefore, you are joining the bounty at your own risk. Please do your own due diligence as  past performance does not guarantee future results."

comments.body: Another big bounty from CMBM but surely will not pay hunters.
